titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Ramon Galinsky advertising portfolio, approximately 1954-1978 RL.11665
titlestmt.author: Richard Collier

publicationstmt.publisher: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2018-09-26 13:22:19 -0400.

repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

origination.label: source
origination.corpname: John W. Hartman Center for Sales, Advertising & Marketing History

did.abstract: Commercial artist and graphic designer who worked in New York and California. Collection includes mechanical drawings, sketches and other design work for magazine and technical catalog illustrations, print advertising, book covers and other areas of commercial design. Companies represented include Aztec Press, California Girl Magazine, Hervey Associates, Ray Allen Studios, Sossner Corporation, Straus Stores, and Tide Employment Agency. Acquired as part of the John W. Hartman Center for Sales, Advertising & Marketing History.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Commercial artist and graphic designer who worked in New York and California. Born 1926, Brooklyn, N.Y.; attended New York University (BS Advertising) and C&I Art School. U.S. Navy Reserve 1943-1966. Died 2003, California.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The Ramon Galinsky advertising portfolio was received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a purchase in 2018.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Ramon Galinsky advertising portfolio, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accessions described in this collection guide: 2018-0121

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection includes mechanical drawings, sketches and other design work for magazine and technical catalog illustrations, print advertising, book covers and other areas of commercial design. Companies represented include Aztec Press, California Girl Magazine, Hervey Associates, Ray Allen Studios, Sossner Corporation, Straus Stores, and Tide Employment Agency. Acquired as part of the John W. Hartman Center for Sales, Advertising & Marketing History.
